attributes.action: MP constituency surgeries to provide a 7 day week service
attributes.background: In the light of the importance placed on essential services offering a 7 day service, we the undersigned demand that MPs, including government ministers, make constituency surgeries available 7 days a week.

rejection.details: Decisions about when (and whether) to hold constituency surgeries are the responsibility of individual MPs, not the Government and Parliament as a whole.
